name: Floowandereeze & Toccan
text: If this face-up card leaves the field, banish it. You can only use each of the following effects of "Floowandereeze & Toccan" once per turn, also you cannot Special Summon the turn you activate either of those effects. If this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 of your banished "Floowandereeze" cards; add it to your hand, then, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Normal Summon 1 Winged Beast monster. If a Winged Beast monster is Normal Summoned to your field while this card is banished: You can add this card to your hand.
